title: System of Fear
description: Congressman Philip D. Crane has a pet project. He just needs a major catastrophe to push it into action. Preacher Luther also has a pet project. He just needs the help of a political heavyweight to help him spread the message to Them.Maya, Charlie and Wix were regular teenagers. They liked to drink, get high, party and do their own thing. But, when their friend Gary is arrested for computer hacking and scheduled for public execution for the first time in their lives they feel the need to act.Recruiting a war veteran with a death wish, they set off to free their friend and bring down the Congressman and anyone affiliated with his corrupt mission. But, when they encounter Crane face to face, they find out he is not alone in his plan to destroy any opposition. And the help he has enlisted leaves them one of two options: submit or die.
author: Nick Sand
